INSIGHT.title: Watch Lana Del Rey & Addison Rae Sing Together At Wembley Stadium
INSIGHT.summary: Addison Rae, the rising pop star, opened for Lana Del Rey at London's Wemberly Stadium, showcasing tracks from her debut album and joining Del Rey for a duet on the unreleased "57.5" and the hit "Diet Pepsi." This marked Rae's first stadium performance, as she shared the stage with one of her clear musical influences, Del Rey, who also performed the fan-favorite "Venice Bitch" for the first time in a couple of years....
